name: quoi-app
description: A mobile quiz app inspired by Buzz and Dr. Why.
author: Whitesmith

scripts.start:app:with-server: npm run build:server && NODE_ENV=development electron main.js
scripts.build:app: npm run build:app:mac && npm run build:app:win && npm run build:app:linux
scripts.build:app:mac: npm run package:app:mac && npm run installer:mac
scripts.build:app:win: npm run package:app:win && npm run installer:win
scripts.build:app:linux: npm run package:app:linux && npm run installer:linux
scripts.installer: npm run installer:mac && npm run installer:win32 && npm run installer:win64 && npm run installer:linux
scripts.installer:win: npm run installer:win32 && npm run installer:win64
scripts.installer:win32: npm run clean:app:win32 && electron-builder "releases/Quoi-win32-ia32/" --platform=win --out="dist/Quoi-win-ia32" --config=builder.json && mv -i dist/Quoi-win-ia32/Quoi\ Setup.exe dist/Quoi-win-ia32/Quoi-win-ia32-Setup.exe
scripts.installer:win64: npm run clean:app:win64 && electron-builder "releases/Quoi-win32-x64/" --platform=win --out="dist/Quoi-win-x64" --config=builder.json && mv -i dist/Quoi-win-x64/Quoi\ Setup.exe dist/Quoi-win-x64/Quoi-win-x64-Setup.exe
scripts.clean:app: npm run clean:app:mac && npm run clean:app:win && npm run clean:app:linux
scripts.clean:app:win: npm run clean:app:win32 && npm run clean:app:win64
scripts.clean:app:linux: npm run clean:app:linux32 && npm run clean:app:linux64
